Author: Icanmakeyouhappy
Text: Thanks for the advice! You’re so right, so much bs knowledge out there, everyone seems to be a certified nutritionist but think it’s impossible

Author: girl_snap_out_of_it
Text: If I could suggest not to go too much in depth if people keep asking you about it or if your progress is going so well that you might wanna share it with someone. I made the mistake of blurting out the phrase "I'm watching what I eat" to a colleague who went on a ramble saying "YOU LOOK GREAT RIGHT NOW, TO LOSE WEIGHT YOU'D HAVE TO HAVE NOTHING BUT STRAWBERRIES AND COCAINE IT IS LITERALLY IMPOSSIBLE TO BE THIN".   Ok, thanks for the compliment(???) but this shit doesn't maintain itself LMAO. I definitely learned a lesson there. Regardless of how much information there is available, access to apps, doctors, etc., people will chalk up weight loss to some Requiem for a Dream type nightmare. It sucks
